thread.title: Prison guard union concerned about the dangers of condoms
thread.title_full: Prison guard union concerned about the dangers of condoms - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bob Egelko
title: Prison guard union concerned about the dangers of condoms
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle Assemblyman Rob Bonta’s bill created a five-year plan to make condoms available to prison inmates in California. The prison guard’s union is not so sure about the plan by the Alameda Democrat. Assemblyman Rob Bonta’s bill created a five-year plan to make...
California prison inmates can now obtain condoms from free dispensers, under a new state law meant to combat AIDS infections, but the prison guards’ union is warning of dire consequences. Assemblyman Rob Bonta’s bill created a five-year plan to make condoms available to prison inmates in California. The prison guard’s union is not so sure about the plan by the Alameda Democrat. Assemblyman Rob Bonta’s bill created a five-year plan to make...
California prison inmates can now obtain condoms from free dispensers, under a new state law meant to combat AIDS infections, but the prison guards’ union is warning of dire consequences.
